name: Ã‰tienne Schmitt
body:
->![Profile picture](https://etienneschmitt.github.io/images/es.jpg)<-

I am a R&D engineer working at [Inria](https://www.inria.fr/) Strasbourg, in the [Mimesis team](http://mimesis.inria.fr/). Our team is specialized in real-time medical simulation. Based on the [SOFA framework](https://www.sofa-framework.org/), we develop innovative technologies to train, assist and guide clinicians.
My work in focused on topology data structures. I am involved in the rewriting of the [CGoGN library](https://github.com/cgogn/CGoGN_2), a c++11 implementation of combinatorial maps.
I am currently working on using CGoGN as the default topology model in SOFA.
